backend/main.mo: Actor managing providers, user profiles, custom metadata, and access control with admin/user‑gated mutations and queries.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding workflowRuns and nextWorkflowRunId fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining authenticated routes for all provider pages and app sections.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication guard that blocks content until Internet Identity login is complete or successful.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication state and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and locally store a profile name until backend support exists.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatbotComm: Chat interface for provider-specific messaging with backend connection checks, message history, and draft syncing.
frontend/src/components/common/BackendCo: Displays backend connection errors with suggested actions and retry or login options.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorBoun: React error boundary that catches component errors and displays a resettable fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/common/NotIntegr: Callout component indicating a feature is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/keys/ProviderKey: UI for viewing, adding, and updating provider API keys with backend readiness and error handling.
Main layout shell providing navigation, routed content, and automatic profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobilePro: Mobile sidebar listing AI providers with navigation and current-route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileTop: Mobile top-nav menu offering quick navigation links to major app sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Renders the top navigation bar with logo, desktop links, mobile menu, and login button.
frontend/src/components/providers/Provid: Guards provider actions by checking backend connection and API key availability before rendering children.
Displays a sidebar listing available AI providers with navigation links and active state highlighting.
Handles workflow option inputs, execution, run tracking, and result display for provider tools.
frontend/src/components/providers/Recomm: Shows a list of clickable recommended prompts that can be inserted into the command box.
frontend/src/components/workflows/Execut: Displays workflow run status, inputs used, metadata, and an option to reuse parameters.
frontend/src/components/workflows/Genera: Shows a scrollable history of workflow runs with actions to download, share, or reuse past results.
Renders workflow run status, preview, and provides download and share actions for generated artifacts.
Provides chat message querying and sending for a given provider using backend actor and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/keys/useProviderKey.t: Fetches whether a provider key exists and provides a mutation to save or update a provider API key.
frontend/src/hooks/providers/useCustomPr: Loads and saves custom provider metadata such as display names via actor queries and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/providers/useResolved: Resolves a provider’s display name, preferring custom metadata overrides when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor instance, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Initializes a backend actor with optional identity and admin token handling, exposing readiness and retry state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides queries for fetching the caller’s user profile and checking admin status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/workflows/useWorkflow: Runs workflows and updates workflow runs via mutations, invalidating related queries on success.
Fetches workflow runs for a provider and periodically polls when runs are pending or running.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes including color and layout tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin-only dashboard showing placeholder cards for future management tools and permission checks.
frontend/src/pages/KeyVaultPage.tsx: Displays provider API key status cards and links to manage keys for each provider.
frontend/src/pages/LinksDashboardPage.ts: Shows a placeholder interface for future CRUD management of external links.
frontend/src/pages/MemoryBrainPage.tsx: Provides a placeholder UI for a future RAG-based memory system called Empire Brain.
frontend/src/pages/ProviderHubPage.tsx: Lists all AI providers with descriptions, capabilities, and links to each provider's command center.
frontend/src/pages/providers/CustomSlotP: Allows editing custom provider metadata, managing keys, and interacting with chat/tools for a custom provider slot.
frontend/src/pages/providers/GenericProv: Generic provider dashboard offering key management, chat, tools, and recommended prompts based on provider config.
frontend/src/pages/providers/LTXPage.tsx: Renders the LTX provider page with key management, prompt selection, chat interface, and optional workflow tool options.
Renders the OpenAI provider page with tabs for chat, image generation, and analysis, plus key management and chat functionality.
frontend/src/pages/providers/ReplicatePa: Renders the Replicate provider page including key management, recommended prompts, chat interface, and workflow tool options.
Renders the RunPod provider page with key management, recommended prompts, chat interface, and custom workflow option inputs.
frontend/src/pages/providers/SlackPage.t: Renders the Slack provider page with key management, chat interface, recommended prompts, and optional workflow tool options.
frontend/src/pages/StudioToolsPage.tsx: Contains placeholder cards for upcoming studio tools like motion brush, magic script, and history.
frontend/src/providers/providers.ts: Defines provider configurations, workflow types, option fields, and metadata for all supported providers.
frontend/src/utils/artifacts.ts: Utility functions for artifact URLs, downloads (placeholder implementation), MIME type detection, and filename generation.
Provides utilities to classify backend errors and generate user-friendly messages and action steps.
frontend/src/utils/share.ts: Provides a function to share an artifact via the Web Share API with clipboard fallback and a helper to detect support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, fonts, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current architecture, features, issues, and versioned state for an AI provider–centric app.
